name: stock-monitor-workspace
description: Real-time stock monitoring dashboard with MySQL database integration

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.test:services: powershell -Command "try { Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://localhost:4000/api/health' -TimeoutSec 5; Write-Host 'Backend: OK' } catch { Write-Host 'Backend: FAIL' }; try { Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://localhost:3000' -TimeoutSec 5; Write-Host 'Frontend: OK' } catch { Write-Host 'Frontend: FAIL' }"

author: Stock Monitor Team
